content.question: Who are considered Regular/Permanent Employees at NIDA-Pakistan?

answers.option: Members of the Senior Management Team appointed under open-ended agreements.
Short-term consultants working on specific projects.
Temporary employees hired for casual tasks.
Interns on probation for less than three months.

content.correct: Correct! Permanent employees include SMT members appointed indefinitely.
content.incorrect: Incorrect. The correct answer is: Members of the Senior Management Team appointed under open-ended agreements.
